SEARCH
Package org.example.controller

Class MainController

java.lang.Object
org.example.controller.MainController
public class MainController extends Object

MainController.

The main controller class for the application. Responsible for creating controllers, and handling communication between them.

Since:
0.3.0
Version:
1.0.0
